resources.string: "INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `DRIVER` (`DRIVER_ID`,`DRIVER_NAME`,`LICENSE_NO`,`EMAIL`) VALUES (?,?,?,?); UPDATE `DRIVER` SET 'DRIVER_ID'=?,`DRIVER_NAME`=?, `LICENSE_NO` = ?, `ADDRESS` = ?, `STREET` = ?, `CITY` = ?, `STATE` = ?, `PINCODE` = ?, `CARRIER` = ?, `TRUCK_ID` = ? WHERE `EMAIL` = ?"

" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `DRIVER_PREFS` (`DRIVER_PREFS_ID`,`DRIVER_ID`,`TIME_ZONE`,`DUTY_CYCLE_ID`,`ODOMETER`,`LOG_INCREMENT`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?); UPDATE `DRIVER_PREFS` SET `DRIVER_PREFS_ID` = ?, `DRIVER_ID` = ?, `TIME_ZONE` = ?, `DUTY_CYCLE_ID` = ?, `ODOMETER` = ?, `LOG_INCREMENT` = ? WHERE `DRIVER_ID` = ?"

" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `DUTY_CYCLE_MASTER` (`CycleCode`,`CarrierType`,`CycleHours`,`CycleDays`,`ResetHours`,`DrivingLimitHours`,`OffDutyLimitHours`,`ShiftLimitHours`,`BreakLimitHours`,`BreakDurationHours`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?); UPDATE `DUTY_CYCLE_MASTER` SET `CycleCode` = ?, `CarrierType` = ?, `CycleHours` = ?, `CycleDays` = ?, `ResetHours` = ?, `DrivingLimitHours` = ?, `OffDutyLimitHours` = ?, `ShiftLimitHours` = ?, `BreakLimitHours` = ?, `BreakDurationHours` = ? WHERE `CarrierType` = ?"

" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `EventTable` (`time`,`endtime`,`eventtype`,`place`,`notes`,`latitude`,`longitude`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?); UPDATE `EventTable` SET `time` = ?,`endtime` = ?, `eventtype` = ?, `place` = ?, `notes` = ?, `latitude` = ?, `longitude` = ? WHERE `time` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `VirdefectsTable` (`DefectID`,`DefectName`) VALUES (?,?); UPDATE `VirdefectsTable` SET `DefectID` = ?, `DefectName` = ? WHERE `DefectID` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `RegisterVechile` (`EmailId`,`NickName`,`Color`,`PlateNo`,`Fuel`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?);"
"UPDATE `RegisterVechile` SET `EmailId` = ?, `NickName` = ?, `Color` = ?, `PlateNo` = ?, `Fuel` = ? WHERE `_id` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `DriverUpdated` (`EmailId`,`Name`,`Phone`,`Email`) VALUES (?,?,?,?); UPDATE `DriverUpdated` SET `EmailId` = ?, `Name` = ?, `Phone` = ?, `Email` = ? WHERE `Name` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `TRUCK_DEFECT` (`VIR_NUM`,`TRUCK_DEFECT_MASTER_ID`,`DEFECT_NANE`,`DESCRIPTION`,`STATUS`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?);"
" UPDATE `TRUCK_DEFECT` SET `VIR_NUM` = ?, `TRUCK_DEFECT_MASTER_ID` = ?, `DEFECT_NANE` = ?, `DESCRIPTION` = ?, `STATUS` = ? WHERE `_id` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `TRUCK_DEFECT_MASTER` (`VIR_NUM`,`TIME`,`CARRIER`,`LOCATION`,`ODOMETER`,`UNI_NO`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?);"
" UPDATE `TRUCK_DEFECT_MASTER` SET `VIR_NUM` = ?, `TIME` = ?, `CARRIER` = ?, `LOCATION` = ?, `ODOMETER` = ? , `UNI_NO` = ? WHERE `_id` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `TimeZones` (`TimeZoneId`,`Name`) VALUES (?,?); UPDATE `TimeZones` SET `TimeZoneId` = ?, `Name` = ? WHERE `TimeZoneId` = ?"

" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `BillsTable` (`CoDriver`,`StartPlace`,`EndPlace`,`StartOdometer`,`EndOdometer`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?); UPDATE `BillsTable` SET `CoDriver` = ?, `StartPlace` = ?, `EndPlace` = ?, `StartOdometer` = ?, `EndOdometer` = ? WHERE `CoDriver` = ?"

" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `CARRIER` (`CompanyName`,`CompanyAddress`,`CompanyPhoneNo`,`CompanyWebsite`) VALUES (?,?,?,?); UPDATE `CARRIER` SET `CompanyName` = ?, `CompanyAddress` = ?, `CompanyPhoneNo` = ?, `CompanyWebsite` = ? WHERE `CompanyName` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `AddDocumentTable` (`EmailId`,`DocName`,`date`,`RefNum`,`Notes`,`ImagePath`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?);"
"UPDATE `AddDocumentTable` SET `EmailId` = ?, `DocName` = ?, `date` = ?, `RefNum` = ?, `Notes` = ?, `ImagePath` = ? WHERE `_id` = ?"
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `Documents` (`DocumentName`) VALUES (?);"
"SELECT `DRIVER_NAME`, `LICENSE_NO`, `EMAIL` FROM DRIVER WHERE EMAIL=?"
"SELECT `DRIVER_PREFS_ID`, `DRIVER_ID`, `TIME_ZONE` FROM DRIVER_PREFS WHERE DRIVER_ID=?"
"SELECT `CycleCode`, `CarrierType`, `CycleHours` FROM DUTY_CYCLE_MASTER "
"SELECT `CycleCode`, `CarrierType`, `CycleHours`,`OffDutyLimitHours`,`DrivingLimitHours`,`ShiftLimitHours` FROM DUTY_CYCLE_MASTER WHERE CycleCode=?"
"SELECT `time`, `endtime`, `eventtype`, `place`,`notes`,`latitude`,`longitude` FROM EventTable "
"SELECT `_id`,`DefectID`, `DefectName` FROM VirdefectsTable "
"SELECT `_id`, `EmailId`, `NickName`, `Color`,`PlateNo`,`Fuel` FROM RegisterVechile "
"SELECT `_id`, `EmailId`, `NickName`, `Color`,`PlateNo`,`Fuel` FROM RegisterVechile WHERE PlateNo=?"
"SELECT `EmailId`, `Name`, `Phone`,`Email` FROM DriverUpdated "
"SELECT `_id`,`VIR_NUM`, `TRUCK_DEFECT_MASTER_ID`, `DEFECT_NANE`, `DESCRIPTION`,`STATUS` FROM TRUCK_DEFECT WHERE VIR_NUM=? "
"SELECT `_id`, `VIR_NUM`, `TIME`, `CARRIER`, `LOCATION`,`ODOMETER`,`ODOMETER`,`UNI_NO` FROM TRUCK_DEFECT_MASTER "
"SELECT `_id`,`VIR_NUM`, `TIME`, `CARRIER`, `LOCATION`,`ODOMETER`,`UNI_NO` FROM TRUCK_DEFECT_MASTER WHERE UNI_NO=?"
"SELECT `TimeZoneId`, `Name` FROM TimeZones "

"SELECT DISTINCT Date(et.time) as day,case cast (strftime('%w', et.time) as integer) when 0 then 'Sunday' when 1 then 'Monday' when 2 then 'Tuesday' when 3 then 'Wednesday' when 4 then 'Thursday' when 5 then 'Friday' else 'Saturday' end as DayName, coalesce((SELECT SUM((julianday(ett.endtime) - julianday(ett.time)) * 24) from EventTable ett where julianday(ett.time) = julianday(et.time) and (ett.eventtype = 'on_duty' or eventtype = 'driving') group by julianday(ett.time)) , 0) as hoursWorked FROM EventTable et order by et.time desc limit 7"

"SELECT DISTINCT Date(et.time) as day,UPPER((case cast (strftime('%w', et.time) as integer) when 0 then 'Sunday' when 1 then 'Monday' when 2 then 'Tuesday' when 3 then 'Wednesday' when 4 then 'Thursday' when 5 then 'Friday' else 'Saturday' end) || ' ' || substr ('--JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', strftime ('%m', et.time) * 3, 3) || ' ' || strftime ('%d', et.time)) as DayName , coalesce((SELECT SUM((julianday(ett.endtime) - julianday(ett.time)) * 24) from EventTable ett where julianday(ett.time) = julianday(et.time) and (eventtype = 'driving') group by julianday(ett.time)) , 0) as hoursDriven, coalesce((SELECT SUM((julianday(ett.endtime) - julianday(ett.time)) * 24) from EventTable ett where julianday(ett.time) = julianday(et.time) and (ett.eventtype = 'on_duty' ) group by julianday(ett.time)) , 0) as hoursOnDuty FROM EventTable et order by et.time desc limit 14"

"SELECT `time`, `endtime`, `eventtype`, `place`,`notes`,`latitude`,`longitude`, strftime(`%Hh %Mm`, strftime(`%s`,endtime) - strftime(`%s`,time), `unixepoch`) duration FROM EventTable where strftime(`%Y-%m-%d`, time) = strftime(`%Y-%m-%d`, ?)"

"SELECT `time`, `endtime`, `eventtype`, `place`,`notes`,`latitude`,`longitude`, strftime('%Hh %Mm', strftime('%s',endtime) - strftime('%s',time), 'unixepoch') duration FROM EventTable where strftime('%Y-%m-%d', time) = strftime('%Y-%m-%d', ?)"
"SELECT `_id`, `CoDriver`, `StartPlace`, `EndPlace`,`StartOdometer`,`EndOdometer` FROM BillsTable"
"SELECT `_id`, `CompanyName`, `CompanyAddress`, `CompanyPhoneNo`,`CompanyWebsite` FROM CARRIER"
"SELECT `_id`, `EmailId`, `DocName`, `date`,`RefNum`,`Notes`,`ImagePath` FROM AddDocumentTable WHERE DocName=?"
"SELECT `DocumentName` FROM Documents"

"SELECT gu.`USER_ID`, gu.`USER_NAME`, `USER_TYPE_ID`, `EMAIL`, `MOBILE_NUMBER`, `USER_TYPE`, `SERVER_SALT`, gu.USER_FULL_NAME, DISPLAY_HELP, (SELECT coalesce(SUM(ump.POINT_COUNT), 0) FROM USER_METHOD_POINTS AS ump WHERE gu.USER_NAME = ump.USER_NAME COLLATE NOCASE GROUP BY ump.USER_NAME) AS POINTS, (SELECT coalesce(SUM(ump.STAR_COUNT),0) FROM USER_METHOD_POINTS AS ump WHERE gu.USER_NAME = ump.USER_NAME COLLATE NOCASE GROUP BY ump.USER_NAME) AS STARS FROM `G_USER` AS gu WHERE gu.USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE AND `PASSWORD_DIGEST` = ?"

"SELECT `USER_NAME`, `PACKAGE_ID`, `PACKAGE_CODE`, `PACKAGE_TITLE`, `PACKAGE_DESC`, `PACKAGE_AUTHOR`, PACKAGE_TYPE, `PACKAGE_DOWNLOADS`, `PACKAGE_RATING`, `PACKAGE_IMAGE_COUNT`, `PACKAGE_VIDEO_COUNT`, `PACKAGE_GAME_COUNT`, PACKAGE_PRICE, TOPICS_COUNT, THUMBNAIL, PACKAGE_CREATOR,coalesce((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(TOPIC_ID)) FROM USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS AS um WHERE USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE AND um.PACKAGE_ID = mp.PACKAGE_ID GROUP BY PACKAGE_ID, TOPIC_ID), 0) AS TOPICS_USED_COUNT, CATEGORY, CATEGORY_COLOR, PACK_TYPE_VAL, DOWNLOADED_PACK_VER, CURRENT_PACK_VER FROM `MY_PACKS` AS mp WHERE USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE;"

"SELECT S.STYLE_NAME AS STYLE_NAME, coalesce((SELECT MIN(SUM(coalesce(U.STYLE_COUNT, 0)), 100) FROM USER_STYLE_STATS AS U WHERE U.STYLE_NAME = S.STYLE_NAME AND U.USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE GROUP BY U.STYLE_NAME), 0) AS COUNT, S.RES_ICON AS RES_ICON, S.RES_COLOR AS RES_COLOR FROM STYLE AS S"

"INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_STYLE_STATS` (`USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`,`PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`,`METHOD_ID`,`ACTION_TIME`, `STYLE_NAME`, `STYLE_COUNT`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DateTime('now'),?, ?);"

"INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_METHOD_POINTS` (`USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`,`PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`, `METHOD_ID`,`ACTION_TIME`,`STAR_COUNT`,`POINT_COUNT`,`REASON`) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DateTime('now'), ?, ?, ?);"

"SELECT 1 AS QT, `METHOD_ID`, `METHOD_LIKE`, `METHOD_BOOKMARK`, `METHOD_RATING`, 0 AS METHOD_USAGE_TIME FROM `USER_METHOD_STATS` WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID=? AND TOPIC_ID=? AND SESSION_ID=? AND PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID=? UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS QT, METHOD_ID, 0 AS METHOD_LIKE, 0 AS METHOD_BOOKMARK, 0 AS METHOD_RATING, (SUM(END_TIME) - SUM(START_TIME)) as METHOD_USAGE_TIME FROM USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS_VIEW WHERE USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID=? AND TOPIC_ID=? AND SESSION_ID=? AND PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID=? GROUP BY PACKAGE_ID, TOPIC_ID,SESSION_ID,PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID, METHOD_ID"

"SELECT S.STYLE_NAME AS STYLE_NAME, coalesce((SELECT MIN(SUM(coalesce(U.STYLE_COUNT, 0)), 100) FROM USER_STYLE_STATS AS U WHERE U.STYLE_NAME = S.STYLE_NAME AND U.USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE AND S.PACKAGE_ID= ? GROUP BY U.STYLE_NAME), 0) AS COUNT, S.RES_ICON AS RES_ICON, S.RES_COLOR AS RES_COLOR FROM STYLE AS S"

"SELECT S.STYLE_NAME AS STYLE_NAME, coalesce((SELECT MIN(SUM(coalesce(U.STYLE_COUNT, 0)), 100) FROM USER_STYLE_STATS AS U WHERE S.PACKAGE_ID= ? GROUP BY U.STYLE_NAME), 0) AS COUNT, S.RES_ICON AS RES_ICON, S.RES_COLOR AS RES_COLOR FROM STYLE AS S"

"SELECT S.STYLE_NAME AS STYLE_NAME, coalesce((SELECT MIN(SUM(coalesce(U.STYLE_COUNT, 0)), 100) FROM USER_STYLE_STATS AS U, TEACHER_PROFILE TP WHERE U.STYLE_NAME = S.STYLE_NAME AND U.USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE AND U.USER_NAME = TP.G_USER_NAME AMD TP.CURRICULUM = ? AND GROUP BY U.STYLE_NAME), 0) AS COUNT, S.RES_ICON AS RES_ICON, S.RES_COLOR AS RES_COLOR FROM STYLE AS S"

"INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS` (`METHOD_TYPE_NAME`, `START_TIME`, `END_TIME`, `USER_NAME`, `PACKAGE_ID`, `TOPIC_ID`, `SESSION_ID`, `PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`, `METHOD_ID`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?); "
"SELECT DISTINCT USER_NAME, PACKAGE_ID, COUNT(TOPIC_ID) as USED_TOPICS_COUNT FROM USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS WHERE USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE GROUP BY PACKAGE_ID"

"SELECT USER_NAME, PACKAGE_ID, TOPIC_ID, METHOD_ID, SUM((END_TIME - START_TIME))+1, as METHOD_USAGE_TIME FROM USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS_JOURNAL WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE GROUP BY PACKAGE_ID, TOPIC_ID, METHOD_ID"

"SELECT S.STYLE_NAME AS STYLE_NAME, coalesce((SELECT MIN(SUM(coalesce(U.STYLE_COUNT, 0)), 100) FROM USER_STYLE_STATS AS U WHERE U.STYLE_NAME = S.STYLE_NAME AND U.USER_NAME=? AND PACKAGE_ID=? AND TOPIC_ID=? AND SESSION_ID=? AND PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID=? GROUP BY U.STYLE_NAME), 0) AS COUNT, S.RES_ICON AS RES_ICON, S.RES_COLOR AS RES_COLOR FROM STYLE AS S"
"SELECT METHOD_TYPE_NAME FROM USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS WHERE USER_NAME=? AND PACKAGE_ID=? AND TOPIC_ID=? AND SESSION_ID=?"
"SELECT METHOD_TYPE_NAME FROM USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS WHERE USER_NAME=? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID=? AND TOPIC_ID =? ORDER BY START_TIME ;"

"INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `MY_PACKS` (`PACKAGE_CODE`,`PACKAGE_TITLE`,`PACKAGE_DESC`,`PACKAGE_AUTHOR`, `PACKAGE_DOWNLOADS`,`PACKAGE_RATING`, `PACKAGE_IMAGE_COUNT`,`PACKAGE_VIDEO_COUNT`,`PACKAGE_GAME_COUNT`, PACKAGE_TYPE, PACKAGE_PRICE, TOPICS_COUNT, THUMBNAIL, PREVIOUS_VERSION_NO, CURRENT_VERSION_NO, CATEGORY, CATEGORY_COLOR, PACK_TYPE_VAL, DOWNLOADED_PACK_VER, CURRENT_PACK_VER, `PACKAGE_CREATOR`,`USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, '1.0', '1.0',?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,?) UPDATE `MY_PACKS` SET PACKAGE_CODE = ?, PACKAGE_TITLE = ?,PACKAGE_DESC = ?,PACKAGE_AUTHOR = ?, PACKAGE_DOWNLOADS = ?,PACKAGE_RATING = ?, PACKAGE_IMAGE_COUNT = ?, PACKAGE_VIDEO_COUNT = ? , PACKAGE_GAME_COUNT = 0, PACKAGE_TYPE = ?, PACKAGE_PRICE = ?, TOPICS_COUNT = ?, THUMBNAIL = ?, PREVIOUS_VERSION_NO = "1.0", CURRENT_VERSION_NO = '1.0', CATEGORY = ?, CATEGORY_COLOR = ?, PACK_TYPE_VAL = ?, DOWNLOADED_PACK_VER = ?, CURRENT_PACK_VER = ? ,`PACKAGE_CREATOR` = ? WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID = ? "
"UPDATE `G_USER` SET DISPLAY_HELP = ? WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE;"
"UPDATE `STUDENT_ASSESSMENT` SET STUDENT_NAME = ?, SCORE = ?, DELETE_STATUS = 1 WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID = ? AND TOPIC_ID = ? AND TEST_NAME = ? AND ROLL_NO = ?;"
"SELECT STUDENT_NAME, SCORE, ROLL_NO, DELETE_STATUS FROM `STUDENT_ASSESSMENT` WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID = ? AND TOPIC_ID = ? AND TEST_NAME = ? AND DELETE_STATUS = 0 ;"
UPDATE `MY_PACKS` SET PACK_TYPE_VAL = ? WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID = ?
UPDATE `MY_PACKS` SET DOWNLOADED_PACK_VER = ? WHERE USER_NAME = ? COLLATE NOCASE AND PACKAGE_ID = ?

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_METHOD_STATS` (`METHOD_BOOKMARK`, `METHOD_LIKE`, `METHOD_RATING`, `USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`, `PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`, `METHOD_ID`, `METHOD_TYPE_NAME`,`ACTION_TIME`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_METHOD_STATS_JOURNAL` (`METHOD_BOOKMARK`, `METHOD_LIKE`, `METHOD_RATING`, `USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`, `PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`, `METHOD_ID`, `METHOD_TYPE_NAME`,`ACTION_TIME`,`OID` ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_METHOD_POINTS` (`USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`,`PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`, `METHOD_ID`,`ACTION_TIME`,`STAR_COUNT`,`POINT_COUNT`,`REASON`) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_STYLE_STATS` (`USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`,`PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`,`METHOD_ID`,`ACTION_TIME`, `STYLE_NAME`, `STYLE_COUNT`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS` (`USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`,`PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`, `METHOD_ID`, `METHOD_TYPE_NAME`, `START_TIME`,`END_TIME`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `USER_METHOD_USAGE_STATS_JOURNAL` (`USER_NAME`,`PACKAGE_ID`,`TOPIC_ID`,`SESSION_ID`,`PEDAGOGY_CARD_ID`, `METHOD_ID`, `METHOD_TYPE_NAME`, `START_TIME`,`END_TIME`, OLD_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `STUDENT_ASSESSMENT` (`STUDENT_NAME`, `SCORE`, `DELETE_STATUS`, `USER_NAME`, `PACKAGE_ID`, `TOPIC_ID`, `TEST_NAME`, `ROLL_NO`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
SELECT DISTINCT TEST_NAME FROM `STUDENT_ASSESSMENT` WHERE USER_NAME =? AND PACKAGE_ID = ? AND TOPIC_ID =?
